Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-1TP4 (natural AMPs; frogs, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature:
95.8% SIMILAR TOBrevinin-1TP2.Activity: Active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 3.1 uM), E. faecium 091299 (MIC 100 uM), E. faecalis 981 (MIC 3.1 uM), N. asteroides 201118 (MIC 3.1 uM), Gram- P.aeruginosa CGMCC 1.50 (MIC >100 uM), K. pneumoniae 08040724 (MIC 100 uM), E. cloacae CGMCC 1.57 (MIC 100 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 100 uM), P. faecalis X29 (MIC 25 uM), and fungi C. glabrata 090902 (MIC 3.1 uM), and C. albicans(ATCC 10231 (MIC 50 uM).Toxicity:  50% Hemolysis: HC50 ~12.5 uM, highly hemolytic.
Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Guo C, Hu Y, Li J, Liu Y, Li S, Yan K, Wang X, Liu J, Wang H.2014
Literature Information.Title: Identification of multiple peptides with antioxidant and antimicrobial activities from skin and its secretions of Hylarana taipehensis, Amolops lifanensis, and Amolops granulosus
